level.heading: Order to expedite.
level.text: ยง 5-436 Order to expedite. At any time after the date of the filing of such street closing and acquisition maps, the corporation counsel, or any owner may apply to the court for an order directing any owner or owners, or the corporation counsel, as the case may be, to show cause why further proceedings under this subchapter on the part of such owner or owners or of the corporation counsel should not be expedited. Upon the hearing directed by such an order to show cause, the court, in its discretion, may make an order directing that such proceedings should be expedited in the manner stated therein and also making such further directions with respect to the particulars shown upon the application as shall be just and proper in the premises.
